title: An Act directing the city of Boston Police Department to waive the maximum age requirement for police officers for Adam Watt

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Fluker-Reid of Boston, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 3928) of Brandy Fluker-Reid (with the approval of the mayor and city council) that the city of Boston be authorized to appoint Adam Watt a police officer notwithstanding the maximum age requirement.  Public Service.  [Local Approval Received.]

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Public Service
Hearing scheduled for 09/10/2025 from 1:00 PM-4:00 PM in A-1

Hearing rescheduled to 09/10/2025 from 01:00 PM-01:30 PM in A-1                                                                                                              and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
